verbs.description: [V: Citing] [ARG1: a ruling that President Donald Trump can not block other Twitter users] , [ARG0: a federal judge] denied a request to dismiss a lawsuit against the Meriden Police Department for blocking a Facebook commenter .

Citing a ruling that President Donald Trump [V: can] not block other Twitter users , a federal judge denied a request to dismiss a lawsuit against the Meriden Police Department for blocking a Facebook commenter .
